name: Minior
flavor_text: This is its form when its shell has fallen off. The color of its core depends on the materials that made up the food it ate.

abilities.name: Far-Flying Meteor
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is on your Bench, when you attach an Energy card from your hand to this Pokémon, you may switch it with your Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Gravitational Tackle
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage for each {C} in your opponent’s Active Pokémon’s Retreat Cost.
